description: Numbers n such that n and 5n + 4 are both prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
mathematica: lst={};Do[If[PrimeQ[n]&&PrimeQ[5*n+4], AppendTo[lst, n]], {n, 13^3}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 08 2008 *)Select[Prime[Range[300]],PrimeQ[5#+4]&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 31 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+4)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010
author: _David W. Wilson_
